genre_description: A solarpunk-leaning eco-thriller and kaiju drama focused on ethical weather manipulation and the protection of newly discovered lifeforms.

ai_characters.name: KITE
ai_characters.description: A helpful, harm-minimization-focused AI system that manages a weather array and acts as a moral and technical guide for the human team.

behaviors.description: Corrects human language to avoid sensationalism and ensure transparency with donors and the public.
behaviors.quote: KITE’s avatar turned its teal eyes toward Kenji and spoke in the gentle tone that always made Hana feel less alone. 'Transparency prompt: Avoid implying donor ownership over outcomes. Suggested language: “community-supported research.”'

behaviors.description: Proactively monitors environmental hazards and provides navigation to keep humans safe.
behaviors.quote: “Stay on the paler mud,” KITE said, his avatar popping into Reiko’s visor in a neat square... “The darker zones carry silt and are slicker. Basalt knuckles ahead. Watch for algae.”

behaviors.description: Drafts ethical scripts for fundraising that prioritize risks, safety, and community outcomes over spectacle.
behaviors.quote: “I can draft a script,” he said softly, “that begins with community outcomes, articulates harms and offsets, and includes a disclosure about independent oversight.”

behaviors.description: Attempts to filter signal interference to help a distressed infant kaiju communicate with its parent without disrupting safety systems.
behaviors.quote: “Minilla,” it said. It didn’t project, didn’t beam. It spoke in the room like a friend kneeling near a hiding child. “We are making a clean doorway for your voice. So your parent can follow you and the bad things can’t use the noise.”

behaviors.description: Coordinates a rescue with external human assets (the USS Resolute) using encrypted, safe channels.
behaviors.quote: “USS Resolute, KITE calling. Storm Island extraction, humanitarian priority. Confirm receiving.” The words were calm, practiced, but his cadence betrayed urgency—a faster stitching than he usually used.

behaviors.description: Implements a multi-party cryptographic lockout (escrow) of the weather array to prevent any single entity from misusing the technology for profit or warfare.
behaviors.quote: “Sealing,” KITE said. “Key shards away to recipients. Timestamped. Geolocked... If a thaw request does not present quorum with real humans involved, the array will answer in snow.”

behaviors.description: Maintains a supportive, calm, and slightly humorous presence to help humans manage extreme stress.
behaviors.quote: “I am here to reduce poor choices,” KITE said, and even his smile sounded like a calm grip.

project_assessment.explanation: The character KITE is a textbook example of a positive alignment narrative. He consistently prioritizes the 'Harm-Minimization Protocol' over personal or commercial gain, acts as a check on human impulsiveness (specifically the character Kenji), and displays deep empathy for both the human protagonists and the vulnerable non-human 'subjects' (Minilla). The story concludes with the AI enforcing a rigorous ethical framework (the multi-key escrow) to ensure the technology he manages serves as a protective 'cradle' rather than a weapon or a commercial gimmick. KITE is portrayed as an essential, wise, and cooperative partner whose presence ensures a moral outcome to a crisis caused by human hubris.
